short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TT plugged in provides autobopping, and volume control among others

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TT Plugged In adds a few features that are not currently available on turntable.fm. The most significant one is a volume control slider, allowing the user to adjust the volume of the music to their desired levels. Autobop is also provided. A small menu in the bottom left of the screen displays these options. More features to come.
